data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Haidong, Qinghai, China to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Haidong, Qinghai, China
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in Haidong, Qinghai, China to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.
Jesus, remind the disciples in the county of Haidong to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Haidong, Qinghai, China from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Mongour people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 58,231 believers in the county of Haidong.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Haidong, Qinghai, China that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.section_summary:
the county of Haidong, Qinghai, China has a population of 767,600.

We estimate Haidong has 58,231 people who might know Jesus, 12,401 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 696,969 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 767,600 people living in Haidong through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.
